title: Watt's last voyage
creator_credit: University of Melbourne. Film Society and Brian Davies
brief_description: A tale told with humour and pathos; a yarn spun between decks about an old salt whose bitter experiences one friendless dawn persuade him to abandon wayfaring for wading. Cast includes Graeme Blundell, Robin Laurie, John Wregg.
creator_credit_for_label: University of Melbourne. Film Society and Brian Davies
